content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and pipe group(position x=5.5, y=6.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 50} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting to connect them.
- Check for any placement blockage or obstacles that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty and suitable for the entity to be placed.
- Check for any existing objects that may be in the way of the placement.

### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure the prototype is valid and exists before attempting to use it.
- Check for any typos or incorrect usage of the prototype.

### Errors when accessing entity attributes
- Ensure the entity has the attribute being accessed before attempting to access it.
- Check for any typos or incorrect attribute names.

### Errors when using positions
- Ensure the position is valid and exists before attempting to use it.
- Check for any typos or incorrect position coordinates.
